message:
What is the largest production deployment of #Mesos?

-I know it's been bench marked on 50,000 nodes tested on AWS for a large company (either AirBNB, twitter or Netflix) so this might give an indication of what it's intended to grow 

-Probably Twitter where the project was incubated. ~100K physical nodes. They aren't terribly public about this.
story: Mohamed Radwan shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: What is the largest production deployment of Mesos?
caption: quora.com
description: Answer (1 of 3): I was A2A. Disclaimer: I don't have hard data, that is, I can't back up my statements concerning numbers with official sources. So, depending on your definition of "largest prod deployment"â€”one single cluster or the overall count across different clusters within one organizatio...
